body_html:
@peterjc123

If I completely comment out the apply_utils_test and add back the AT_API macro to the functions in CPUGeneral.h I'm able to successfully build ATen.

Maybe there is something to be said about the tests themselves and them missing some kind of settings?

The cmake file for the tests is here.
body_text:
@peterjc123
If I completely comment out the apply_utils_test and add back the AT_API macro to the functions in CPUGeneral.h I'm able to successfully build ATen.
Maybe there is something to be said about the tests themselves and them missing some kind of settings?
The cmake file for the tests is here.
body:
@peterjc123 

If I completely comment out the apply_utils_test and add back the AT_API macro to the functions in CPUGeneral.h I'm able to successfully build ATen.

Maybe there is something to be said about the tests themselves and them missing some kind of settings?

The cmake file for the tests is [here](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/aten/src/ATen/test/CMakeLists.txt).
